boardgame.name: SPQR
boardgame.description: This game contains counters and maps that allow the reproduction of five battles of warfare in the Roman Republic. The mechanics allow leaders to activate units within their command range in order to rout or destroy the other player's army._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Volume II in GMT Games' Great Battles of History Series._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Contains:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;5 Battles_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;2 doublesided maps_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;3.5 counter sheets_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Rules for SPQR_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Battles:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;bull; Beneventum_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;bull; Bagradas_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;bull; Cannae_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;bull; Zama_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;bull; Cynocephalae_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

listing.notes: This is actually a french Ed1. version of the game but I have the proper English Ed2. rule and scenario books for it in addition to the French ones. All components are present and in excellent condition - the counters are not punched and the box is like new (having French writing on the back).

SPQR - The Art of War in the Roman Republic 275-197BC by GMT games. In excellent condition, partially punched, set up once (all loose counters in plastic baggies). Box cover is a bit sun faded, but maps and counters look brand new! Also includes the SPQR Players Guide (I included this because I can_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t find a listing for it on Board Game Geek).

This includes the Player_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Guide, Pyrrhic Victory, Africanus, Consul for Rome, and War Elephant. The box is showing some age--a dent here, a scratch there--but it_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s together. I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m selling off a lot of GBOH material; give it a look. Shipping to the US is $7; please ask about foreign shipping. If you want multiple items, each other GBOH game will cost an extra $2 to ship. Personal checks must clear before item ships.

2nd Edition _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;half deluxe_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; unpunched with a 3rd edition 32 page print out. Original rules are missing as are the player aid cards so I went ahead and printed them out for you consuming about 20% of an ink cartridge(not cheap) AND augmented with the following materials from my 3CI collection; Alexander in Italy, a hypothetical 2-game Module in C3i #5 (Great Battle of Alexander and Pyrrhic Victory needed)Battle of Castulo, 211 BC, the end of Publius Scipio, from C3i #5, Battle of Telamon, 225 BC, the Celtic War, from C3i #6, Mago: Youngest of the Lion_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Brood, Mago Barca in the 2nd Punic War, from C3i #6,Caralis: The Battle for Sardinia, 215 BC, from C3i #9,Variant Skirmishers, Velites and Light Troops including the 74 counters from 3CI #15 and more. I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m tired. In short you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll receive in some cases less than the 3rd edition and other cases more. I also copied commentary and startegy articles when I came across them.
